# [A Purposeful Institute]{.heading-large}

<br>

[SARA was founded in 2023 for community-rooted data science education & research. Our mission is to enhance the representation of under-privileged communities in data science and mentor them to cultivate creativity and lead impactful lives.]{.text-large .r-fit-text}
